title: 2010년 Reid 사건
summary: 미국 California, CA 법원 판결 사건. 사건명: Reid. 판결일: 2010-08-05. 법원: California Supreme Court.
description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: BRIAN REID, Plaintiff and Appellant, v. GOOGLE, INC., Defendant and Respondent
**판결일**: 2010-08-05
**법원**: California Supreme Court
**관할**: California, CA

**판사**: Chin

## 변호인

Counsel, Duane Morris, Barry L. Bunshoft, Ray L. Wong, Paul J. Killion, Lorraine P. Ocheltree, Eden E. Anderson and Allegra A. Iones for Plaintiff and Appellant., Charlotte E. Fishman for California Employment Lawyers Association as Amicus Curiae on behalf of Plaintiff and Appellant., Thomas W. Osborne, Melvin Radowitz and Barbara A. Jones for AARP as Amicus Curiae on behalf of Plaintiff and Appellant., Wilson Sonsini Goodrich & Rosati, Fred W. Alvarez, Marina C. Tsatalis, Amy K. Todd, Marvin Du

- 50 Cal. 4th 512
